shapecode_0_border_g=0.000
shapecode_0_border_b=0.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=a=0.1+(0.1*mid);	
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=20
shapecode_1_additive=1
shapecode_1_thickOutline=1
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.200
shapecode_1_y=0.000
shapecode_1_rad=3.00000
shapecode_1_ang=0.27000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=0.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=0.039
shapecode_1_r2=0.200
shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=rad=bass*2;
shape_1_per_frame2=r=min(sin(1-time),1);
shape_1_per_frame3=g=1-min(sin((1-r)*3.14),1);
shape_1_per_frame4=b=min(abs(sin(2-g-r)),1);
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=20
shapecode_2_additive=1
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.100
shapecode_2_y=0.900
shapecode_2_rad=3.00000
shapecode_2_ang=0.27000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=0.100
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=0.040
shapecode_2_r2=0.100
shapecode_2_g2=0.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=rad=treb*2;
shape_2_per_frame2=r=min(abs(sin(time-0.6)),1);
shape_2_per_frame3=g=1-min(abs(sin((1-r)*3.14)),1);
shape_2_per_frame4=b=min(abs(sin(1-g)),1);
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=20
shapecode_3_additive=1
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.900
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=1.58000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=0.800
shapecode_3_g=0.800
shapecode_3_b=0.800
shapecode_3_a=0.800
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=0.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=0.000
shapecode_3_border_g=0.000
shapecode_3_border_b=0.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=xp=0.53129;
shape_3_per_frame2=yp=0.25;
shape_3_per_frame3=xcorr=yp*0.18+0.3;
shape_3_per_frame4=ang=time*150;
shape_3_per_frame5=xq=xp*sin(ang);
shape_3_per_frame6=yq=yp;
shape_3_per_frame7=zq=xp*cos(ang);
shape_3_per_frame8=xp=xq*sin(ang)+zq*cos(ang);
shape_3_per_frame9=yp=yq;
shape_3_per_frame10=zp=xq*cos(ang)-zq*sin(ang);
shape_3_per_frame11=xq=xp;
shape_3_per_frame12=yq=yp*sin(ang)+zp*cos(ang);
shape_3_per_frame13=zq=yp*cos(ang)-zp*sin(ang);
shape_3_per_frame14=zq=zq+3.14;
shape_3_per_frame15=xs=xq/zq;
shape_3_per_frame16=ys=yq/zq;
shape_3_per_frame17=x=min(abs(xs*5-xcorr),1);
shape_3_per_frame18=y=min(abs(ys*1.3+0.5),1);
shape_3_per_frame19=r=min(abs(sin(time)),1);
shape_3_per_frame20=g=1-min(abs(sin((1-r)*3.14)),1);
shape_3_per_frame21=b=min(abs(sin(1-g)),1);
shape_3_per_frame22=rad=(bass+mid+treb+2)*0.05;
per_frame_init_1=mv_x=64;mv_y=48;
per_frame_init_2=nut=0;
per_frame_init_3=stp=0;stq=0;
per_frame_init_4=rtp=0;rtq=0;
per_frame_init_5=wvr=0;
per_frame_init_6=decay=0;
per_frame_init_7=dcsp=0
per_frame_init_8=
per_frame_1=decay=1;
per_frame_2=zoom=0.95+.075*max(treb_att,bass_att);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=vol=(bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.25;
per_frame_7=vol=vol*vol;
per_frame_8=mtime=mtime+vol*0.1;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=q1=mtime*0.4-.05*time;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.00+0.5 ).x;
warp_4=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.98+0.5 ).y;
warp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_13=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_14=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_15=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.95+0.5 ).z;
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`    // .x = fastest layer, .z = slowest
warp_18=`    // slowly shift stuff toward the front, over time:
warp_19=`    ret += float3(-ret.x,ret.x-ret.y,ret.y-ret.z)*0.03, (bass_att-1)*0.1;
warp_20=`     
warp_21=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_22=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_23=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*3;
warp_24=`
warp_25=`    // darken over time
warp_26=`//    ret -= 0.003;
warp_27=`    //ret *= 0.99;
warp_28=`    //ret *= 0.97*saturate( length(uv - uv_orig)*200 );  // center only
warp_29=`ret = ret * (0.95 + (sin(mid)*0.05));
warp_30=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float rad_lq = rad * length(texsize.xy)*0.5;
comp_4=`    float ang_lq = ang;
comp_5=`    float2 uv_temp1 = (uv - 0.5) * texsize.xy;
comp_6=`    float rad_hq = length(uv_temp1);
comp_7=`    float ang_hq = atan2(-uv_temp1.y, uv_temp1.x);
comp_8=`
comp_9=`    float2 uv2 = (uv - 0.5);
comp_10=`    float rad2 = rad_lq*0.75;
comp_11=`    float ang2 = ang_lq * M_INV_PI_2;
comp_12=`
comp_13=`        // ROTATION OVER TIME
comp_14=`        ang2 += time*0.025;   //rotate over time
comp_15=`
comp_16=`        // FIN TYPE
comp_17=`        float fins = 8;//3 + floor(rand_preset.z*5.95);
comp_18=`        ang2 = cos(ang2*M_PI_2*fins) * 0.023;
comp_19=`
comp_20=`
comp_21=`    ang2 *= M_PI_2;
comp_22=`    uv2 = 0.5 + rad2*float2(cos(ang2),sin(ang2))*texsize.zw;
comp_23=`
comp_24=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv2).xyz;
comp_25=`    ret *= 1.0; // a little bit of overbright
comp_26=`}
